example.name: all arguments
example.text: GMAC screened the card-member list for holders more than 30 years old with household incomes over $ 45,000 [*U*] who [*T*-54] had n't `` missed any payments , '' the Buick spokeswoman says [0] [*T*-1] .

example.name: transitive
example.text: They insist that CFCs are damaging the earth 's stratospheric ozone layer , which [*T*-1] screens out some of the sun 's ultraviolet rays .
